TEXT.BODY: Shr 13 cts vs 70 cts Net 1,279,000 vs 7,979,000 Revs 16.4 mln vs 19.6 mln Year Shr 89 cts vs 2.43 dlrs Net 10.3 mln vs 29.8 mln Revs 56.2 mln vs 83.8 mln Avg shrs 12.1 mln vs 13.1 mlnm NOTE: 1986 year net includes gain 12.9 mln dlrs from sale of eight real estate properties. Reuter
